get.summary: JSON Schema definition for the enumeration ValueSet-Transactions
get.description: This endpoint serves the JSON Schema definition for the enumeration ValueSet-Transactions.

ValueSet-Transactions.title: WHO GDHCN Transaction Codes Schema
ValueSet-Transactions.description: JSON Schema for WHO GDHCN Transaction Codes ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-Transactions.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the WHO GDHCN Transaction Codes ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/trust/ValueSet-Transactions.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
